name: Silly paint
description:
press 'R' key to turn to color red, 'B' for blue, 'Y' for yellow.

Use WASD to move the paint box around. Hold 'P' for a bunch of colors at once!!

Silly paint is a game made in javascript, it is a very very simple prototype.

If you want, you can visit the actual site, Sillypaint.com
